pageContext.Title: Javascript - Internals
pageContext.Description: In this Guide you will take some time to understand some topics that are not obviously important to web development but that will prove useful to start deepen your comprehension of what is really happening when a browser reads your code and displays it to the user.

Knowledge.Knowledge: Understand what is the Javascript Event Loops
Understand what is prototypal inheritance in Javascript

Skills.Skill: Be able to write a technical article

actionPoints.actionPoint: Explore what other topics might be there to understand which are internal to Javascript

Deliver.Title: Technical Article
Deliver.Description:

  • Minimum requirements:
    • Technical article about one of the topics above
    • Add at least one chart/drawing to illustrate a concept
    • Add code examples

Competences.Competence: To be ready to collaborate effectively with peers in order to achieve a common goal
To be ready to learn and apply new technologies independently
To be ready to exhibit the results of a collaborative work
To be ready to create and deliver professional-grade web applications
